title: Origami
creator_credit: Joan Hanson, Robert Verrall and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: The Japanese art of paper folding, as practised both by skilled fingers and the less-adept hands of children. That anyone can learn and experiment, and take pleasure from the results, is evident from the variety of shapes and figures being conjured out of colored paper.
creator_credit_for_label: Joan Hanson, Robert Verrall and National Film Board of Canada
